channel.title: Pages on Random Bits
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Random Bits

item.title: About Me
item.description: I was born in 1991 in the Pacific Northwest of the USA, which is also where I currently live. I’m a Christian, married to a wonderful woman, and have 3 crazy little kids. Occupation I create software for a living, with a focus on backend servers. About 4 years ago, I discovered Elixir and mainly write in and about that, though I do have experience with Ruby on Rails and modern Javascript.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Courses LearnElixir.tv Teaches Elixir with step-by-step video tutorials. LearnPhoenix.tv Teaches how to use Phoenix, the popular Elixir web framework.
Open Source Software I built and maintain several libraries on my own: Project Language Stats Description number Elixir Converts numbers to common formats ex_twilio Elixir API client for Twilio cloak Elixir Encrypts database fields with Ecto immortal Elixir Helpers for OTP applications destructure Elixir Javascript-style destructuring
